title: Waistcoat, 1962-54-48, 1780–90
medium: Technique: Embroidery: satin, stem and knot stitches in fourteen colors on silk 7&1 satin foundation
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Gentleman's waistcoat with embroidered design of grape harvesting and wine casks.

exhibitions.title: The Greenleaf Collection: Textile Arts from the 16th to early 19th century
